ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Unlimited
ModMetaData.author: erdelf and Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
v0.8.3 Public Test Version Does not remove modern items. Adds a blacksmith forge to forge steel. Adds iron and mithril. Rebalances iron into the primary mineable resource, rather than steel.
To do: Add a certain ring. Fix various bugs.
